statements: SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT sample_id, sequencing_data FROM genomic_data WHERE experiment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM genomic_data ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, sample_id FROM genomic_data WHERE sample_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM genomic_data;
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE sample_id > 100 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, experiment_id, jsonb_typeof(sequencing_data) FROM genomic_data WHERE experiment_id = 5;
SELECT sample_id, JSONB_PRETTY(sequencing_data) FROM genomic_data WHERE sample_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT DISTINCT experiment_id, COUNT(*) as total_samples FROM genomic_data GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING total_samples > 10 ORDER BY total_samples DESC;
SELECT sample_id, jsonb_array_elements(sequencing_data -> 'genes') AS gene FROM genomic_data WHERE sequencing_data ->> 'organism' = 'Human';
SELECT * FROM genomics_data
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sequencing_method FROM genomics_data ORDER BY sample_id DESC
SELECT sample_name, sequenced_data FROM genomics_data WHERE sequencing_method = 'RNA-Seq'
SELECT analysis_id, sample_id, analysis_date FROM analysis_results INNER JOIN genomics_data ON analysis_results.sample_id = genomics_data.sample_id
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM genomics_data WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM genomics_data ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT sample_id, COUNT(analysis_id) AS analysis_count FROM analysis_results GROUP BY sample_id;
SELECT genomics_data.sample_name, analysis_results.analysis_result FROM genomics_data INNER JOIN analysis_results ON genomics_data.sample_id = analysis_results.sample_id;
SELECT sample_name FROM SampleData;
SELECT * FROM Experiment WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_data FROM Experiment WHERE sample_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM AnalysisResults ORDER BY result_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, result_data FROM Experiment INNER JOIN AnalysisResults ON Experiment.experiment_id = AnalysisResults.experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM SampleData WHERE sample_id = 1;
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, jsonb_array_length(sequencing_data->'read_lengths') AS total_reads FROM SampleData ORDER BY total_reads DESC;
SELECT experiment_name, jsonb_object_keys(experiment_data) AS variables FROM Experiment WHERE experiment_id > 10 ORDER BY experiment_id ASC;
SELECT result_id, experiment_id, jsonb_object_agg(result_data->> 'gene',result_data->'expression_level') AS gene_expression FROM AnalysisResults GROUP BY result_id, experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM SampleData WHERE sample_name ILIKE '%example%' ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenomeSamples;
SELECT sample_id, sequenced_at FROM GenomeSamples WHERE experiment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT result_id, coverage, variants_count FROM SequencingResults ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT gene_name, function, pathway FROM GeneAnnotations WHERE pathway = 'Cell Cycle';
SELECT sample_id, chromosome, position, variant_type FROM GeneticVariants WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND variant_type = 'SNP';
SELECT * FROM GenomeSamples ORDER BY sequenced_at DESC;
SELECT sample_id, file_path FROM GenomeSamples WHERE experiment_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM GeneticVariants WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT * FROM SequencingResults WHERE coverage > 50 AND variants_count > 10 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT ga.gene_name, ga.function, gv.variant_type FROM GeneAnnotations ga INNER JOIN GeneticVariants gv ON ga.gene_name = gv.gene_name;
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE age > 40;
SELECT name, age, condition FROM patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT MAX(quality_score) FROM sample;
SELECT experiment_type, read_depth FROM experiment WHERE coverage > 50;
SELECT chrom_position, mutation_type, allele_frequency FROM variant ORDER BY allele_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patient JOIN sample ON patient.patient_id = sample.patient_id WHERE sample.quality_score > 0.8 AND sample.tissue_type = 'blood'

SELECT patient.name, sample.date_collected, experiment.experiment_type FROM patient JOIN sample ON patient.patient_id = sample.patient_id JOIN experiment ON sample.sample_id = experiment.sample_id WHERE experiment.read_depth > 100

SELECT patient.name, analysis.analysis_type, analysis.result_details FROM patient JOIN sample ON patient.patient_id = sample.patient_id JOIN experiment ON sample.sample_id = experiment.sample_id JOIN analysis ON experiment.experiment_id = analysis.experiment_id WHERE analysis.researcher_name = 'John Doe'

SELECT patient.name, sample.date_collected, variant.mutation_type FROM patient JOIN sample ON patient.patient_id = sample.patient_id JOIN experiment ON sample.sample_id = experiment.sample_id JOIN variant ON experiment.experiment_id = variant.experiment_id WHERE variant.allele_frequency >= 0.05
